attributes.action: REMOVE CANNABIS FROM SCHEDULE 1 OF THE MISUSE OF DRUGS ACT
attributes.additional_details:
Cannabis and Cannabinoids http://www.cancer.gov/about-cancer/treatment/cam/patient/cannabis-pdq                                                               
Medical cannabis patents http://www.faqs.org/patents/assignee/gw-pharma-limited/
attributes.background:
SCHEDULE 1 MISUSE DRUGS ACT STATES CANNABIS HAS NO MEDICAL VALUE
CONTRARY TO SCIENTIFIC EVIDENCE AVAILABLE THAT SUPPORTS ITS MEDICINAL VALUE
REMOVING CANNABIS FROM SCHEDULE 1 
WILL ENABLE SICK AND DYING PEOPLE ACCESS 
WILL AFFORD CITIZENS OF THE UK EQUAL PARITY WITH USA,EUROPE,URUGUAY, ISRAEL

rejection.details:
We cannot accept duplicate petitions. We think this petition is similar to yours:  
 
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/105708
 
You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
